attributes.action: sell the 2012 Olympics to the highest paying country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
One of the main reasons for the mega mosque being built is due to the olympics in 2012. The proposed mosque is going to be the biggest landmark, bigger than St Pauls Cathedral.
So if we sell the 2012 Olympics to another country we won't need the Mosque!!!
